channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Looking for some help with Friday's NYT Connections words? Some hints and the answers are right here.

item.title: Creators See Subscription-Based Platforms As TikTok Alternative
item.description: That includes building a following on other platforms—something many creators and influencers should have already been doing.

item.title: Brand Finance CEO David Haigh on Green Washing v Green Hushing

item.title: How PherDal’s At-Home Insemination Kit Helps People Conceive Safely
item.description: Founder, Dr. Jennifer Hintzsche created the PherDal kit—which is a play on the word 'fertile'—to try and solve her own infertility challenges.
